biography: Jarkko, affectionately known as "Bailando" among his peers for his rhythmic precision on the greens, is a familiar and respected figure at the Hector Trophée. Representing Hirsala Golf, Jarkko brings a blend of skill and competitive spirit to the tournament.

With eight past appearances, Jarkko's experience is undeniable. His ninth appearance is coming up in Hector Trophée 2025 (null). Beyond his consistent presence, Jarkko has clinched the coveted Hector Trophée once, in addition to one Victor trophy, marking him as a formidable player to watch.

Off the course, Jarkko is known for his thoughtful demeanor and strategic mind, qualities that undoubtedly contribute to his success in both individual and pair formats. As he prepares for yet another Hector Trophée, anticipation builds to see how Jarkko's experience and tactical acumen will play out on the course.
